dateplot1.title: Chamber pressure
dateplot1.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), pressure FROM pressure_stm312 where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot2.title: Elbow pressure
dateplot2.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), pressure FROM pressure_stm312_elbow where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot3.title: Sample temperature
dateplot3.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), temperature FROM temperature_stm312 where temperature between -1 and 1600 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot4.title: Big turbo prepump pressure
dateplot4.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), pressure FROM pressure_stm312_prepumpbigturbo where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot5.title: Gashandling prepump pressure
dateplot5.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), pressure FROM pressure_stm312_prepumpgashandling where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot6.title: Diff prepump pressure
dateplot6.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), pressure FROM pressure_stm312_prepumpdiff where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot7.title: Pressure
dateplot7.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), pressure FROM pressure_stm312 where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot8.title: STM Temperature
dateplot8.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), temperature FROM temperature_stm312_stm where temperature > -998 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot1.title: Big turbo temperatur
dateplot1.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), temperature FROM temperature_stm312_big_turbo where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot2.title: Gas handling turbo temperatur
dateplot2.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), temperature FROM temperature_stm312_gas_handling where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot3.title: Sputter gun turbo temperatur
dateplot3.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), temperature FROM temperature_stm312_sputter_gun where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot1.title: Sample temperature
dateplot1.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), temperature FROM temperature_stm312 where temperature between -1 and 1600 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot2.title: Filament Bias
dateplot2.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM stm312_filament_bias where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot3.title: Filament Current
dateplot3.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM stm312_filament_current where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot4.title: Filament Power
dateplot4.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM stm312_filament_power where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot5.title: HV Bias
dateplot5.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM stm312_HV_bias where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot6.title: HV Emmision Current
dateplot6.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM stm312_HV_emmision_current where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot7.title: HV Power
dateplot7.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM stm312_HV_power where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot1.title: Big turbo temperatur
dateplot1.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), temperature FROM temperature_stm312_big_turbo where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot2.title: Gas handling turbo temperatur
dateplot2.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), temperature FROM temperature_stm312_gas_handling where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot3.title: Sputter gun turbo temperatur
dateplot3.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), temperature FROM temperature_stm312_sputter_gun where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot1.title: Pirani pressure
dateplot1.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), pressure FROM pressure_stm312hp_pirani where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot2.title: Pressure controller pressure
dateplot2.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), pressure FROM pressure_stm312hp_pressure_controller where time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot3.title: Temperature
dateplot3.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), temperature FROM temperature_stm312hp where temperature > -998 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot4.title: Power supply Voltage
dateplot4.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_stm312 where type = 'hp_psu_voltage' and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot5.title: Power supply current
dateplot5.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_stm312 where type = 'hp_psu_current' and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot6.title: Sample temperature
dateplot6.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), temperature FROM temperature_stm312 where temperature between -1 and 1600 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

queries.default: SELECT x,y FROM xy_values_stm312 where measurement = {id} order by id
SELECT x,y FROM xy_values_stm312 where measurement = {id} order by id
SELECT x/1000,y FROM xy_values_stm312 where measurement = {id} order by id
